summary: As the Metropolitan Museum of Art closes, Big Bird decides to leave his Sesame Street friends behind in search of Snuffy. Once locked inside for the night, educational hilarity ensues as ... See full summary »

title: Don't Eat the Pictures: Sesame Street at the Metropolitan Museum of Art
